# Bonus section

```{r}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
```

## Loading the data

```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv("raw_data/data.csv")
```

## An interesting plot

```{r}
ggplot(raw_data) +
  theme_classic() +
  geom_boxplot(aes(Sex, NumLimbsMissing)) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("Female", "Male")) +
  labs(x = "Sex", y = "Number of limbs missing", title = "Males have lost more limbs on average than females")
```
